channel.title: Made up wars - Who you think would win
channel.description:
Here's some made up wars that go on and I just want your opinions on this. Remember this is with [b]no nuclear warfare[/b] This is just land, sea, and air.
This is all todays war. Not back in Nam or WW2. Today if this happend
If you need help with a decision look here for help: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_countries_by_size_of_armed_forces [code] 1. U.S.A and France and Great Britain vs China, Russia, North Korea
Answer: _________
Explanation -
2. U.S.A vs China
Answer _______
Explanation -
3. Great Britain vs France
Answer ________
Explanation -
4. Canada vs Mexico
Answer ________
Explanation -
5. France vs Germany
Answer _______
Explanation -
6. North Korea and Iraq and Iran vs Japan
Answer _________
Explanation -
7. Great Britain and China vs Russia and France
Answer __________
Explanation -
8. India vs North Korea
Answer ________
Explanation -
9. Pakistan and South Korea and Iran vs Vietnam and Turkey
Answer _________
Explanation -
10. The Grandaddy war - U.S.A and China and Great Britain and France and Germany [b]vs[/b] Russia and China and Japan
Answer ________
Explanation - [/code]
Ok, here's mine now.
[code]1. U.S.A and France and Great Britain vs China, Russia, North Korea
Answer: __China, Russia and North Korea_______
Explanation - China's man power + Russia's technology and Korea's will to fight...
2. U.S.A vs China
Answer ___U.S.A____
Explanation - China is strong, no doubt, but they have horrible war tactics and aren't the most caught up in warfare technology.
3. Great Britain vs France
Answer ____France____
Explanation - There both equal in smarts as far as I know, but France has more man power.
4. Canada vs Mexico
Answer ___Mexico_____
Explanation - Mexico is poor, and weak. Canada is weak and cowardly. Mexico could send all there little "gangsters" and have them be bad asses in war
5. France vs Germany
Answer ___Germany____
Explanation - Germany is so beyond anyone else in technology, it would blow you away.
6. North Korea and Iraq and Iran vs Japan
Answer ___Japan______
Explanation - Japan's got balls, and the only threat out of those 3 is North Korea.
7. Great Britain and China vs Russia and France
Answer ____Russia and France______
Explanation - That would be a very close war... Russia and France combined would be just too much though.
8. India vs North Korea
Answer ____India____
Explanation - Those guys are [b]amazingly[/b] smart.
9. Pakistan and North Korea and Iran vs Vietnam and Turkey
Answer ____Vietnam and Turkey_____
Explanation - Vietnam is a very good war people and Turkey, even though they don't show it, are pretty smart and have man power.
10. The Grandaddy war - U.S.A and China and Great Britain and France and Germany [b]vs[/b] Russia and China and Japan
Answer ____U.S.A and China and Great Britain and France and Germany____
Explanation - That war... Would be so deadly ahaha. I honestly don't know, so I'll root for the home team.. [/code]
Now your turn guys, and please don't screw around. I hate how you guys think your so hilarious and you just look like a douche bag the whole time your flaming for no reason..

[quote=ChaosPkers]Explanation - Mexico is poor, and weak. Canada is weak and cowardly. Mexico could send all there little “gangsters” and have them be bad asses in war

Cowardly? How are we cowardly? We’ve been invading afghanistan since 2001. A large mile stone in Canada’s independence was it’s bravery in battle. Weak, kinda. But we’re also rich, and can become strong any time we need to.[/quote]

item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

  1. U.S.A and France and Great Britain vs China, Russia, North Korea

Answer: USA France and GB

Explanation - Skilled soliders, China has idiots with guns, Russia has nukes but cant use em and NK is a fucked place

  1. U.S.A vs China

Answer China

Explanation -Population

  1. Great Britain vs France

Answer GB

Explanation - Hot tea can put out ur cigarettes frenchys

  1. Canada vs Mexico

Answer [b]Mexico

Explanation - Determination… Hell im sure everyone in mexico would be trying to cross the border, half would slip into america and half would fight[/b]

  1. France vs Germany

Answer [b]Germany

Explanation - A very intelligent country with much power and l33t weapons (H&K)[/b]

  1. North Korea and Iraq and Iran vs Japan

Answer NK, Iraq, Iran

Explanation - Japan is small, 1 rpg kills like 500 people…

  1. Great Britain and China vs Russia and France

Answer Impossible

Explanation - Wouldn’t happen… refuse to answer

  1. India vs North Korea

Answer India

Explanation - The red dot on there head opens up and shoots laz0rz

  1. Pakistan and South Korea and Iran vs Vietnam and Turkey

Answer Pk, Sk, I

Explanation - suicide bombers, a decent country, and bombs

  1. The Grandaddy war - U.S.A and China and Great Britain and France and Germany vs Russia and China and Japan

Answer China is on both sides dumbass…

Explanation - Well obviously there a spy, so it would b every1 vs china…

  1. U.S.A and France and Great Britain vs China, Russia, North Korea

    Answer U.S.A
    Explanation - U.S.A steals their fish
  3. Great Britain vs France
    Answer France
    Explanation - Great Britain will fail with their teacups
  4. Canada vs Mexico
    Answer Mexico
    Explanation - Tacos!!!
  5. France vs Germany
    Answer Germany
    Explanation - N.A.Z.I
  6. North Korea and Iraq and Iran vs Japan
    Answer U.S.A
    Explanation - Owned.
  7. Great Britain and China vs Russia and France
    Answer Russia and France
    Explanation - They ask U.S.A to help
  8. India vs North Korea
    Answer North Korea
    Explanation - Indian’s will be like “hallo buhti”
  9. Pakistan and South Korea and Iran vs Vietnam and Turkey
    Answer Pakistan and South Korea
    Explanation - PAKIS FTW!!
  10. The Grandaddy war - U.S.A and China and Great Britain and France and Germany vs Russia and China and Japan
    Answer U.S.A
    Explanation - We got t3h Mcd0naLdZ bizNITCHS
